You may cast creature spells as though they had flash.
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater you control enters, draw a card.

Other Zombies you control get +1/+1.
Whenever one or more Zombies you control deal combat damage to a player, you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

This creature can’t block.

Target opponent sacrifices a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker. If fewer than three permanents were sacrificed this way, draw a number of cards equal to the difference.
Deathborne 3 [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by sacrificing three creatures in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)[/i]

Return up to two target creature cards from graveyards to the battlefield. They become Zombies in addition to their other types and gain decayed. [i](A creature with decayed can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
Deathborne 2 [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by sacrificing two creatures in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)[/i]

Whenever you cast a black spell, gain 1 life.
Sacrifice this creature, pay 5 life: Surveil 1, then draw a card.

• Sacrifice half the swamps you control, rounded up.

Surveil 1, then draw two cards.
